oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Performance - Earl Gaines - 2004-03-27 - First performance of two
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performance by Earl Gaines from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on March 27, 2004. In support of the exhibit "Night Train to Nashville: Music City Rhythm and Blues".
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Earl Gaines;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Recording begins in progress. Unidentified instrumental -- Unidentified instrumental possibly The Stroll -- Cissy Strut -- Introduction of Earl Gaines -- Every Night Of The Week -- Everything Will Be Alright -- Let's Sit and Talk -- It's Love Baby (24 Hours A Day) -- The Door Is Still Open -- Turn On Your Love Light -- When Something Is Wrong With My Baby -- Let The Good Times Roll -- I Believe In Your Love -- Closing comments and walk off music.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Gaines, Earl; Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.);
